short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TinyGo: Quick keyword-URL navigation in Chrome. Use 'g' command for smart suggestions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TinyGo is a Chrome extension that simplifies web navigation. Create and manage custom keyword-URL pairs for quick access to your favorite websites. With TinyGo, enhance your browsing efficiency and save time.

Features:

Easy Shortcut Creation: Link keywords to URLs for instant navigation.
Smart Omnibox Activation: Use the 't' command to activate TinyGo and get URL suggestions based on your keywords.
Seamless Experience: Access websites directly in the same tab, with no interruptions.
Simple Management: Easily edit or delete your keyword-URL pairs.
Cross-Device Syncing: Keep your shortcuts handy across all your Chrome-enabled devices
